sentence.Network_en: Skipping is one of the most enjoyable aerobic activities.
sentence.Network_cn: 跳绳是最有乐趣的有氧健身运动之一。

sentence.Network_en: Walking, done in the right way, is a form of aerobic exercise.
sentence.Network_cn: 走路，如果方法正确的话，也是一种有氧健身运动。

sentence.Network_en: Aerobic exercise moves our entire body and uses most major muscles.
sentence.Network_cn: 有氧运动活动全身，锻炼大多数主要肌肉。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from aero- + Greek bios 'life' + -ic

entry.def: Aerobic activity exercises and strengthens your heart and lungs.

example.ex: Aerobic exercise gets the heart pumping and helps you to burn up the fat.
example.tran: 有氧运动加速心脏跳动，有助于消耗更多脂肪。

means.word_mean: 1. depending on free oxygen or air;
2. based on or using the principles of aerobics; enhancing respiratory and circulatory efficiency;
